attributes.action: stop using the co2 issue to raise tax, demonise motorists and cut services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Without scientific proof this government and politicians in general seem to be using carbon emissions as an excuse to levy taxes on anything not deemed to be  ‘green’. I suggest we wait until there is proof that humans are to blame for climate change, or is it in fact Mother Nature doing what she has been doing for millions of years

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
